name: Cryptstalker Legguards
tooltip:
Cryptstalker LegguardsLevel 60

Huntsman Leopold at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Cryptstalker Legguards if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Legguards, 20 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 3 Arcanite Bars and 5 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Legguards
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 20
- Arcanite Bar x 3
- Cured Rugged Hide x 5
